oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discussion Paper for "Changes in interpretation of basis principles” (Draft)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Johansen, Pia Heike
Ichihara, Saki
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
History of organics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper intends to depict and analyse the case of mismatch between organic principles and practice in Denmark. The investigation aims to reveal changes in the interpretation of organic agriculture that may explain the cause of the mismatch between principles and practice.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Johansen, Pia Heike and Ichihara, Saki (2002) Discussion Paper for "Changes in interpretation of basis principles” (Draft). Arbejdspapirer, no. 2002:2, Aalborg University, Institut for Økonomi, Politik og Forvaltning.
